function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Exclusion of papers not focused on smart governance models or disaster management models using emerging planning","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fragmentation of urban planning and service delivery functions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited
